title: Loading Screen Tips
body:
The **loading screen tips** seem to appear in a black screen before getting into the actual loading screen. I'm not sure if that is how they are supposed to work but I recall them appearing in the actual loading screen in the previous patch (problem appears to have come up in this patch).
I'm not pretty sure if I described it precisely but I'm hoping you'll understand and find a solution. (Doesn't only happen to me but I've seen it happen to others too.)

replies.body: Yeeeaaaa I've actually noticed that recently myself. I'm not entirely sure if it was an intended change, and I'm still waiting on a definite answer but I'll be sure to pass the info around when I get it!
Thank you for the feedback, I'm looking forward to an answer.
